notes.note: Prerequisite: EAS 1310 and EAS 1330.

course.subject: EAS
course.course_title: Evolution of the Earth and Life

notes.note: Prerequisites: MATH 1110 or MATH 1910.

course.subject: EAS
course.course_title: The Next Generation of NASA Missions

notes.note: Prerequisite: Basic college math.
Prerequisite: EAS 1310; MATH 1110 or equivalent.
Enrollment limited to: Undergraduate standing in atmospheric science or permission of instructor.
Prerequisite: EAS 2200 or permission of instructor.

Prerequisite: Enrollment in the Cornell University Earth and Environmental Systems Field Program in Hawaii, EAS 2200, EAS 3030, and one semester each of college level chemistry and calculus, or permission of instructor.
Prerequisites: A course in physics.

course.subject: EAS
course.course_title: Field Study of the Earth System

notes.note: Prerequisites: Enrollment in the Cornell University Earth and Environmental Systems Field Program in Hawaii; one semester of calculus (MATH 1910 or MATH 1110); and two semesters of any of the following: PHYS 2207/PHYS 2208 or PHYS 1112/PHYS 2213; CHEM 2070/2080 or CHEM 2090/2080; BIOG 1105/BIOG 1106; or equivalent course work.
Prerequisite: Familiarity with multivariate calculus (MATH 2930, MATH 2130, or MATH 2220 or equivalent); one semester of university physics.
Prerequisites: enrollment in the Cornell University Earth and Environmental Systems Field Program in Hawaii and two majors-level biology courses or permission of instructor.
Prerequisite: EAS 3410; Co-requisite: EAS 3420.
Prerequisites: EAS 2200 or equivalent; completion of some EAS classes helpful, but not required; experience with MATLAB desired.
Prerequisite: One semester of calculus, plus an introductory geology course or permission of instructor.

course.subject: EAS
course.course_title: Seminar on Climate Change Science, Impacts, and Mitigation

notes.note: Prerequisites: Junior or higher standing.
Prerequisite: EAS 4530 or permission of instructor.
Prerequisites: EAS 3410 and EAS 3420 or equivalent.
Prerequisite: EAS 3520 and 4510.
Prerequisite: one year introductory biology and at least one of BIOG 1780, BIOEE 2740, BIOEE 3730, or EAS 3010, or permission of instructor.
The lab will be held at the Museum of the Earth. Transportation will be provided.
Prerequisite: PHYS 2208 or 2213 or equivalent, or permission of instructor.
Prerequisites: Enrollment in the Cornell University Earth and Environmental Systems Field Program in Hawaii.
